title: Rioters, what is the purpose of gaining size?
body:
Elixir of Iron grants 25% increased Size. What are the benefits of this? 

Also, while we're on the topic, to what extent does one have slow resistance whilst under the effect of this elixir. The tooltip isn't very specific.

replies.body: coz its funny putting shields (morg e for example) on gigantic champs
Being bigger as a tank allows you to bodyblock skillshots for your adc (team) more easily.
Also, doesn't it increase your range if you are a melee champ?
Because when you hit full build with nothing else to buy. I'm like. Fk it. Let's get big as fk.{{champion:31}}
